attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is possibly no more deserving sportsman who's devoted his life to his beloved Town & club, the gentleman is loved & revered in his home town. I cosider he's been overlooked for far to long for this honour, please give this elderly man the title we all give him in Bolton.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
